_source.short_desc: Kibo Personalization, powered by Monetate and Certona, is the industry-leading omnichannel testing & eCommerce personalization software
_source.long_desc: Kibo Personalization, powered by Monetate and Certona, is the industry-leading omnichannel testing & eCommerce personalization software. Trusted by more than 600 brands, Kibo's patented technology leverages machine learning & predictive analytics to deliver optimized content, messaging & merchandising to increase engagement & conversions. From sophisticated A/B testing to AI-driven personalization, harness patented technology to delight your customers with impactful individualized experiences.
_source.target_audience: High growth B2C & B2B retailers & brands primarily in apparel, homewares, sporting goods, automotive, food & beverage, & health & beauty industries. Ideal customer is generating $100M+ total revenue.

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Data Security
category_features.definition: Protect digital privacy and secure data

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Kitting
category_features.definition: Group and package individual but related items as one package set

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Marketing
category_features.definition: Coordinate marketing efforts across channels (email, landing pages, social media, etc.)

category_features.name: Multi-Store
category_features.definition: Manage multiple teams and operations from a central location

category_features.name: Promotions Management
category_features.definition: Design, communicate, and distribute incentives to perform a specific action

category_features.name: Returns Management
category_features.definition: Track and facilitate refunds/returns of products sold

category_features.name: Reviews Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor reviews of products or services

category_features.name: SEO Management
category_features.definition: Facilitate search engine optimization associated to content

category_features.name: Templates
category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

related_products.short_desc: From payments to credit to fraud protection, PayPal Commerce Platform helps you meet your customers where they are.
related_products.features:
Over 26 million businesses choose PayPal to power their online payments both home and abroad. With easy setup, world-class fraud and seller protection tools, youll be able to reach more buyers and driver higher sales with PayPal. Whether youre selling on your own website or on marketplaces or via social media you can receive and send payments anywhere in the world with your all-in-one business account for online payments
 
24/7 Fraud Protection - Easy Integration - Global Expertise

related_products.short_desc: Shopify is a commerce platform that allows anyone to easily sell online, at a retail location, and everywhere in between.
related_products.features:
Shopify is a commerce platform that allows anyone to easily sell online, at a retail location, and everywhere in between. Shopify offers a professional online storefront, a payment solution to accept credit cards, and the Shopify POS application to power retail sales. 

Shopify currently powers over 160,000 retailers in 100 different countries, including: Tesla Motors, Gatorade, Forbes, Amnesty International, Encyclopedia Britannica, Maxim Magazine, CrossFit, Black Milk Clothing, Herschel Sup

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace offers an all-in-one Commerce platform that gives you everything you need to run your business and sell online.
related_products.features: Squarespace is an all-in-one platform that gives you everything you need to run and grow your business -- whether you're just getting started or are an established brand. Start with beautiful website templates to make your store stand out. Sell unlimited products and showcase them with rich merchandising tools. Schedule appointments and let customers book your services. Sell subscriptions, digital content, and gift cards. Offer flexible payment options, secure checkout, shipping, and more.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: ShippingEasy is the easiest online shipping platform for growing businesses, featuring discounted shipping rates and easy automation.
related_products.features: ShippingEasy is the easiest, all-in-one shipping, tracking, and email marketing platform for e-commerce merchants. With ShippingEasy, e-commerce sellers can ship fast, access the best shipping rates, and increase orders with a suite of online tools. Multi-carrier and multi-platform capabilities mean you can sell and ship where and how you want while managing everything in one place. Access the lowest USPS and UPS shipping rates, plus other exclusive discounts, regardless of size.

related_products.short_desc: Just pick a template, then customize fonts, colors, and content to match your style.
related_products.features: GoDaddy Website Builder is an online editing and publishing tool that helps you create a website, regardless of your technical skill level. Just create an account, pick a design and use the built-in editor to add your own images and text. You can make your website as simple or complex as you'd like. You can even add a full online store complete with product listings, coupons, shopping cart, shipping, and multiple payment options.

related_products.short_desc: Build an online store that keeps customers coming back for more. Fully integrated with Marketing 360.
related_products.features:
Sell everywhere
Boost sales and direct shoppers to your online store by advertising on the top marketing channels. Marketing automation : Create life-long fans and loyal customers with automated text and email marketing. Easy checkout : Give your customers peace of mind when they shop with easy, safe, and secure credit card processing. Manage everything : Everything you need to manage and grow your online store from a singular platform

related_products.short_desc: Deliver by design - at every stage of e-commerce complexity. Start shipping with Shippo, free.
related_products.features: Ecommerce is complex. Shipping doesn't have to be. Shippo connects you with the best rates at the most carriers using a solution integrated with your business and experienced support at every stage so you can grow into the future. Manage shipping for all of your sales channels and get access to exclusive discounts from USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL + 80 more, automated workflows, detailed tracking and notifications, seamless returns, international customs declarations, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Fishbowl empowers you to outsmart your eCommerce competition by turning data into practical insights and actionable results.
related_products.features: Scale your eCommerce business with seamless integrations with Shopify, eBay, WooCommerce and more. Fishbowl's advanced inventory management system, complete with automated work orders, barcode scanning and barcode label printing, will help your eCommerce business quickly adapt to changes in supply chains, demand forecasts and short-term surges in volume.

related_products.short_desc: The easiest to use eCommerce platform available. Everything from inventory to checkout, payments to shipping & every step in between.
related_products.features:
Ecwid eCommerce is the easiest to use ecommerce platform available. Feature rich with integration to all the leading payment gateways and POS, shopping cart, checkout, inventory management, order management, shipping and notifications are all at your fingertips. Easily manage your store, embed your store on any website, add products, offer discounts and so much more. 

Ecwid also makes selling on Instagram, Facebook, Google Shopping & any marketplace easy from a single dashboard. Try it free.

related_products.short_desc: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management, and order management solution with best-in-class built-in EDI and 700 integrations.
related_products.features: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management and order management solution with built-in EDI and integrations to all the popular eCommerce platforms, marketplaces, and 3PLs. It's best-in-class for all combinations of B2B and D2C sales channels, warehouses, shipping, and fulfillment. Cin7 provides exceptional automations, workflows, reports, and analysis to enable brands, retailers, and wholesalers to operate efficiently as they scale and efficiently match demand to supply.

similar_products.short_desc: fabric helps brands and retailers grow with modern commerce infrastructure, tools, and technology.
similar_products.features: fabric is a modular and headless platform built for modern e-commerce experiences. Customers like Chicos, GNC, Crate & Barrel, Restoration Hardware, and others trust fabric for its open and modular design that allows them to be live within weeks without having to replatform. fabric is a force multiplier on retailers existing technology investments proven to grow digital revenue by up to 3x.

similar_products.short_desc: Convert more customers and grow your brand faster with Commerce Cloud, the worlds leading eCommerce platform.
similar_products.features: Convert more customers and grow your brand with Salesforce Commerce Cloud, the world's leading eCommerce platform. Innovate at the speed of your customers, scale easily across the globe, and meet any level of demand. Extend your commerce with a partner ecosystem of apps to deliver experiences like augmented reality, marketplaces, and more. Unify data, personalize every interaction, and grow revenue across channels with automation, AI, and a single source of truth.

similar_products.short_desc: A leading software-as-a-service (SaaS) ecommerce platform that empowers merchants of all sizes to build, innovate, and grow.
similar_products.features: BigCommerce (Nasdaq: BIGC) is a leading software-as-a-service (SaaS) ecommerce platform that empowers merchants of all sizes to build, innovate and grow their businesses online. As a leading open SaaS solution, BigCommerce provides merchants enterprise-grade functionality, customization and performance with simplicity and ease-of-use. Tens of thousands of companies across 150 countries and numerous industries use BigCommerce, including Ben & Jerry's, S.C. Johnson, Skullcandy, Sony and Vodafone.

similar_products.short_desc: Mid-market software combining CRM and Ecommerce / Web capabilities with Accounting / ERP capabilities in one web-based application.
similar_products.features: Oracle NetSuite's eCommerce solution enables you to leverage the Web to grow your business faster and more cost effectively. It transforms your static website into a dynamic, database-driven eCommerce portal that ties together online customer acquisition efforts with back-office order fulfillment. NetSuite seamlessly ties together eCommerce with customer-facing CRM and accounting/ERP applications, allowing you to support your entire business with one system. Ideal for employee size: 50+

similar_products.short_desc: The eCommerce software powerhouse built for high-volume online stores & complex products.
similar_products.features: There's simply no other solution that does multiple storefronts, B2B eCommerce, and complex product catalogs quite like AmeriCommerce. Whether you're a small business or a high volume ecommerce giant, you can rest easy that AmeriCommerce is the feature-rich platform that won't limit you from scaling even larger. Try our free trial and see for yourself why merchants all over the world are choosing AmeriCommerce.

similar_products.short_desc: The easiest to use eCommerce platform available. Everything from inventory to checkout, payments to shipping & every step in between.
similar_products.features:
Ecwid eCommerce is the easiest to use ecommerce platform available. Feature rich with integration to all the leading payment gateways and POS, shopping cart, checkout, inventory management, order management, shipping and notifications are all at your fingertips. Easily manage your store, embed your store on any website, add products, offer discounts and so much more. 

Ecwid also makes selling on Instagram, Facebook, Google Shopping & any marketplace easy from a single dashboard. Try it free.

similar_products.short_desc: Our e-commerce platform enables retailers and wholesalers, of any size, to develop and maintain powerful online stores.
similar_products.features: Maropost Commerce Cloud is the only retail and wholesale management platform that provides a complete end-to-end solution for eCommerce, POS, Inventory & Fulfilment. Why Commerce Cloud? Our integrated back-end technology enables exceptional and consistent customer experiences via any channel be it in-store, online or through a marketplace, future-proofing retailers in an increasingly competitive market.

similar_products.short_desc: eCommonSense is an industry-specific ecommerce solution that helps suppliers improve sales, build loyalty, and increase efficiency.
similar_products.features: eCommonSense is an industry-specific ecommerce and product information management (PIM) solution that helps home and building suppliers grow sales, increase loyalty, and improve efficiency. Create an online shopping experience that rivals national chains, and efficiently manage content from multiple vendors with our integrated PIM. Seamless ERP integration ensures inventory and pricing is current. Plus, customers can make payments, submit quotes, and schedule pick-ups and deliveries online.

similar_products.short_desc: A digital shelf monitoring platform that empowers consumer brands to win more sales in online stores.
similar_products.features:
A digital shelf monitoring platform that empowers consumer brands to win more sales in online stores.

eStoreCheck is the only global, full-category digital shelf monitoring platform that enables consumer brands to win more sales in online stores. It provides an overview of your brand's online presence on the digital shelf, identifies gaps where you could be losing sales, and automates processes for faster results.

similar_products.short_desc: Miva offers a flexible and adaptable ecommerce platform built to increase revenue, conversions, and order value, while reducing costs.
similar_products.features:
Miva offers a flexible and adaptable ecommerce platform that evolves with your business, delivering increased revenue, conversion rates, and average order value, with lower overhead costs. 

Combining SaaS stability with open source possibilities, Miva helps merchants in all industries grow and succeed without ever worrying if their store can handle it. Built for serious sellers and ambitious growth goals, the Miva platform delivers unmatched security, stability and scalability.

similar_products.short_desc: Sana Commerce Cloud is an e-commerce solution that automates your tech stack and eliminates siloes through real-time ERP integration.
similar_products.features: Sana Commerce Cloud is an ERP integrated e-commerce platform that automates tedious technical processes by making your ERP and your e-commerce work as one. Our real-time integration eliminates system siloes and data inaccuracies caused by mainstream e-commerce solutions. Sana Commerce Cloud creates a single source of truth for data and functionality that never fails you or your customers, leading to higher ROI.

similar_products.short_desc: Finally, a digital sales platform purpose-built for manufacturers that unites eCommerce with CRM and CPQ.
similar_products.features:
Manufacturers, grow as you go with out-of-the-box commerce features & build lasting business relationships with customers, dealers & distributors! This is your ticket to lead with agility and innovation in global, digital markets.

Webshop, Product/Service Catalog & Smart Selling, Online-Configurator; 2D/3D visualizations; After-Sales Portal; Installed-base Up- & Cross-Selling; Partner, Dealer & Distributor Portal

In Mind Cloud is the world's only digital sales platform made for manufacturers.

similar_products.short_desc: Clerk.io's e-commerce personalization software helps online brands create custom-tailored shopping experiences and marketing campaigns.
similar_products.features:
Clerk.io powers personalization and relevance for 2,500+ e-commerce stores worldwide to automatically grow sales across site search, product recommendations, email marketing, social media, ads.

Clerk.io's e-commerce personalization platform analyzes behaviors, trends, and transactions to present powerful real-time search results, product recommendations, related content, profitable email campaigns, and insights that grow sales 15-30%.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Auction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Auction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Auction software includes applications for auto, online, silent, and live auctions. Among its capabilities are lotting, registration, cashiering, inventory management, sales management, accounting and reporting. For additional software solutions see also: Fundraising software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top B2B eCommerce Platforms on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of B2B eCommerce Platforms and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: B2B eCommerce Platforms allow businesses to conduct transactions for goods and services online.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Catalog Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Catalog Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Catalog Management software allows businesses to organize and manage all catalog related data. This typically includes automating the process of updating and maintaining product and service catalogs to provide customers and staff with the real-time information needed to trigger faster buying decisions. Catalog Management solutions can help organize these product catalogs across any sales channel including the web, print, CD, electronic catalogs, on-demand catalogs and more. Catalog Management software is related to Content Management software, eCommerce software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inventory Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inventory Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inventory Management software monitors inventory levels for optimal production and distribution of goods for wholesale or retail. These applications enable organizations to efficiently manage inventory as well as procurement and order fulfillment functions. Inventory Management solutions ensure accurate real-time inventory reporting and the ability to distribute this essential data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Inventory Management software is related to Inventory Control software and Supply Chain Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Multi-Channel eCommerce software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Multi-Channel eCommerce tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Multi-Channel eCommerce software enables businesses to sell and promote products across various sales channels including online marketplaces and social media. It synchronizes all inventory and product data to manage all sales channels centrally.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Order Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Order Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Order Entry software automates the entry, processing and management of sales orders across multiple channels, including: phone, mail order, retail and internet purchases. They also offer category specific feature sets for specific retail sectors such as: cellular/wireless, electronics, furniture, appliance, gifts, pharmacy front stores and music stores. Order Entry applications typically offer real-time integration with inventory control, order management, payment processing, marketing and customer relationship management, helping to optimize costs and increase efficiency. Order Entry software is related to eCommerce software and Order Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Order Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Order Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Order Management software enables the management of orders from initial acceptance to shipment of a finished good. These applications provide customized tools to match an operations workflow, business rules, integration needs, data capture requirements, merchandising techniques and multi-channel sales strategy. Order Management solutions also typically offer real-time integration with inventory control, order management, payment processing, marketing and customer relationship management, helping to optimize costs and increase efficiency. Order Management software is related to eCommerce software and Order Entry software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Point of Sale software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Point of Sale tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Point of Sale (POS) software automates the capture of financial and sales transactions. Retail POS systems are among the most sophisticated and powerful computer networks in commercial use. Point of Sale systems integrate core business functions such as sales tracking, accounts receivable, purchasing and inventory management across multiple registers or retail branches. POS software also provides the infrastructure for connecting retail locations with supply chain operations and upper management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Product Configurator software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Product Configurator tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Product Configurator software automates the configuration of build-to-order products with multiple options. These applications, also known as Sales Configurator solutions, provide manufacturing operations with the capability to easily and efficiently produce highly customizable and configurable product lines. Product Configurator software instantly translates customers' product requests into real-time generated quotes, descriptions, images, bills of material and invoices. Typically Product Configurator applications are integrated with an eCommerce solution, allowing customers to create customized orders in real-time at the time of purchase. Product Configurator software is related to Manufacturing Execution Systems and MRP software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Retail Management systems on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Retail Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Retail Management Systems software manages financial reporting, accounting, and operations of retail stores by integrating core business processes such as point of sale (POS), customer relationship management (CRM), inventory management, accounting, human resources, marketing and eCommerce. By implementing a Retail Management System, organizations can increase sales, decrease costs, and maximize their competitive advantage. These applications facilitate the distribution of key data throughout an enterprise and provide the infrastructure for accurate sales reporting and revenue forecasting.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Small Business eCommerce software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Small Business eCommerce tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Small Business eCommerce software enables small businesses and freelancers to build their own online store with all the features for selling and promoting products online.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Campaign Monitor is an email marketing tool that enables anyone to send beautiful, targeted, and effective email campaigns.
related_products.features: Campaign Monitor is a straightforward email marketing tool that enables marketers to send beautiful and personalized emails, creating a reliable channel to grow engagement with subscribers and promote loyal readership and conversions. Beautiful templates, drag-and-drop builder, and engagement-based segmentation allow marketers to deliver targeted content to large lists of subscribers without any technical expertise.

related_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
related_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With Instapage, marketers can maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, optimizing landing pages at scale, automatically connecting ads with relevant post-click pages, and delivering insights to drive the highest growth possible from digital ad campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Uberflip is a content experience platform (CEP) that enables marketers to take content and package it into relevant digital experiences
related_products.features: Uberflip is a content experience platform (CEP) that enables marketers to take content and package it into digital experiences relevant to target audiences. From account-based marketing campaigns to sales and customer engagement programs, users can give audiences the content and personalized experience they're looking for, in fewer touches. More than 700 customers are using Uberflip to increase their audience's consumption of relevant content, building trust in their brand that drives business.

related_products.short_desc: NiceJob is a reputation marketing platform designed to help businesses get more reviews, referrals, and sales.
related_products.features:
NiceJob is a reputation marketing platform designed to help businesses get the reputation they deserve. It's the easiest way to get more reviews, referrals, and sales.

We believe that if you are really good at something, customers should know about you without the need for you to be a marketing expert.

NiceJob automates your social media marketing using your reviews and photos. We help you improve your search engine results, website traffic, and sales.

related_products.short_desc: Optimizely is the world's leading experimentation platform enabling enterprises to experiment and personalize across websites and apps.
related_products.features: Optimizely is the world's leading experimentation platform, enabling businesses to deliver continuous experimentation and personalization across websites, mobile apps and connected devices. Optimizely enables businesses to experiment deeply into their technology stack and broadly across the entire customer experience.To date, marketers, developers and product managers have delivered over 700 billion experiences tailored to the needs of their customers.

related_products.short_desc: Personalization does not just enable businesses to craft and deliver tailored experiences that delight visitors.
related_products.features:
Delight every visitor with personalization
Visitors on your digital properties expect and deserve experiences that are optimized and personalized for them. VWO Personalize easily lets you deliver 1000s of such unique journeys to the right audience, at the right place, and at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Put the customer experience at the center of your loyalty program.
related_products.features: Nurture relationships and create lasting loyalty on the world's #1 CRM. With Loyalty Management, your business can engage with customers in meaningful ways - bringing value to their experience and to your business. Build a loyalty program with benefits, vouchers, and rewards that will excite your customers. Generate a single source of truth for members that enables personalization at scale and weaves loyalty throughout the customer experience.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based marketing automation solution for businesses that enables to create ads, integrate marketing tools, deploy campaigns, etc.
related_products.features: Since 2007, AdRoll has been on a mission to help businesses compete online and grow revenue. Ambitious commerce brands use the AdRoll E-commerce Growth Platform to make their display, social and email advertising work together to accelerate business growth. Powered by industry-leading automation and personalization, brands are better able to structure, measure and sync their marketing efforts.

related_products.short_desc: Algolia is the leading search & discovery API for websites and mobile apps. Easy to implement and dev-focused.
related_products.features:
Algolia is an API platform for dynamic experiences that helps businesses maximize the speed of search and discovery, while solving the pain of relevance tuning through AI.

Algolia Search is a powerful, fully hosted API that delivers content to users in milliseconds. Devs can customize the relevance of their UX and get insights on how users interact with it.

Algolia Recommend is a robust API that allows you to build unique product recommendations into any digital e-commerce experience.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio Segment is the world's leading Customer Data Platform (CDP). Join the 20,000+ companies using Segment.
related_products.features: Twilio Segment is the world's leading Customer Data Platform (CDP). The platform provides 20K+ companies with the data foundation that they need to put their customers at the heart of every decision. Using Segment, companies can collect, unify and route their customer data into any system where it's needed to better understand their customers and create seamless, compelling experiences in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: IndiVideo interactive personalized videos create 1:1 customer experiences to increase engagement and boost conversions.
similar_products.features: BlueRush offers IndiVideo, a disruptive, award-winning interactive personalized video platform that drives return on investment throughout the customer lifecycle, from increased conversions to engaging statements and customer care. With personalized video, we allow you to boost customer confidence, trust and understanding by simplifying complex financial products. The platform's data-driven video content seamlessly fits into our clients' existing infrastructure to accelerate the buyer journey.

similar_products.short_desc: Walnut is a codeless platform that enables SaaS companies to fully customize, manage, and optimize their product demos.
similar_products.features:
Walnut is a codeless platform that enables SaaS companies to fully customize, manage, and optimize their product demos.
By using Walnut to create personalized and failure-free demos for their clients, sales professionals can increase their conversion rate while collecting valuable insights to improve their sales process.
Grow your bottom line dramatically with powerful demos like Adobe, Medallia, Poeple.ai, NetApp, Varonis, and numerous other industry leaders. Schedule your free demo today.

similar_products.short_desc: Clerk.io's personalization software helps webshops provide a better CX by making it easier for shoppers to find the right products.
similar_products.features:
Clerk.io is e-commerce personalization software that automatically analyzes behavior, trends, and transactions to present shoppers with relevant search results, product recommendations, related content, email campaigns, ads, and more.

Clerk.io powers personalization and relevance for 2,500+ online stores worldwide to automatically grow sales 15-30% on average.

similar_products.short_desc: We help companies build and test personalized, optimized, and synchronized digital customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Built for agility, Dynamic Yield allows teams to quickly take experiences from concept to execution, gain operational independence by working with a single platform, influence the entire customer journey through the same unified hub, do more with fewer people - augmented by our team of experts and scalable AI - and see value faster.

similar_products.short_desc: Unboxing Marketing Automation will significantly increase customer retention and revenue.
similar_products.features: Unboxing Marketing Automation will significantly increase customer retention and revenue. The perfect marketing message and CTA for every e-commerce customer will be automatically dropped inside their package from your fulfillment center.

similar_products.short_desc: Personalization does not just enable businesses to craft and deliver tailored experiences that delight visitors.
similar_products.features:
Delight every visitor with personalization
Visitors on your digital properties expect and deserve experiences that are optimized and personalized for them. VWO Personalize easily lets you deliver 1000s of such unique journeys to the right audience, at the right place, and at the right time.

similar_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
similar_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With Instapage, marketers can maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, optimizing landing pages at scale, automatically connecting ads with relevant post-click pages, and delivering insights to drive the highest growth possible from digital ad campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Predictive intelligence empowers merchandisers and marketers to automate looks for 95% of the product catalog.
similar_products.features: Complete the Look automates and scales content creation so that 95% of products come guidance on how to Complete the Look. Our system creates Looks that are indistinguishable from ones handcrafted by a merchant. Scale AND respect your brand's unique DNA while saving inteShowing customers how to Complete the Look gets them to spend more and buy more often. Statistically significant A/B tests have shown that adding Complete the Look to your pages will increase your total e-commerce revenue 3%-7%.

similar_products.short_desc: Personzye's website personalization solution has a diverse set of tools, including a recommendation and segmentation engine.
similar_products.features: Personyze is a comprehensive website personalization platform that allows you to personalize your site in virtually any way that is technically possible, based on over 70 visitor characteristics, including behavior, referral, CRM data, and more. Combine the power of AI-based recommendations with traditional targeting and over 20 content tools, to add to or change your site to create a more relevant experience for visitors, proven to drive higher conversion and engagement.

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based eCommerce personalization engine that generates product recommendations and supports remarketing email campaigns.
similar_products.features: eCommerce personalization suite that includes AI driven product recommendations, real time website personalization, 360 customer views, and advanced remarketing and triggered email campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Hippo Video is a DIY in-video & hyper video personalization platform for sales outreach & marketing automation workflows in businesses.
similar_products.features: Hippo Video is a next-gen video marketing platform for business. Hippo Video brings in-video & hyper video personalization to sales outreach & marketing automation workflows. Hippo Video has custom workflows for marketing, email campaign, sales, and customer support processes. Hippo Video is the one-stop solution for everything video that delivers deep user insights to bring in more qualified leads and close more sales deals. More than 5000+ businesses worldwide use Hippo Video.

similar_products.short_desc: NiceJob is a reputation marketing platform designed to help businesses get more reviews, referrals, and sales.
similar_products.features:
NiceJob is a reputation marketing platform designed to help businesses get the reputation they deserve. It's the easiest way to get more reviews, referrals, and sales.

We believe that if you are really good at something, customers should know about you without the need for you to be a marketing expert.

NiceJob automates your social media marketing using your reviews and photos. We help you improve your search engine results, website traffic, and sales.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top AB Testing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of AB Testing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Use AB Testing software to increase your website's conversions. By split testing different versions of your web page, you can quickly learn which design elements, colors, and calls to actions have the best results. These applications help you optimize your conversion rate quickly and easily, often with very little coding needed. Related tools can also be found in Campaign Management software, Business Intelligence software, Web Analytics software, Landing Page software, Product Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Account Based Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Account Based Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Account Based Marketing software promotes revenue growth by helping businesses focus its marketing efforts on the key target audience. This software can track and encourage buying intent by delivering personalized marketing content to prospective customers at the time when they are most likely to convert.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Artificial Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Artificial Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Artificial Intelligence software mimics human behavior and learning patterns.  It can be utilized in a variety of business areas, from customer service and sales (in the form of chatbots) to data analysis and IT tasks automation.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Big Data software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Big Data tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Big Data software helps businesses and organizations analyze huge amounts of disparate data in one place. Unify your business information with Big Data software to uncover valuable insights, like buying trends and usage patterns. Big Data software is closely related to Business Intelligence software, Dashboard software, and Data Visualization software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top eCommerce software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of eCommerce tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: eCommerce software enables businesses to conduct transactions for goods and services wholly or partially over the Internet. Typical features for eCommerce applications include: online shopping carts, flexible product category structure and search, customer account and login tools, automatic customer notifications, tax administration, order tracking and print catalog support. eCommerce solutions often provide integration tools for call center support, inventory control, customer relationship management, and payment processing. eCommerce software is related to Order Entry software and Order Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Predictive Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Predictive Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Predictive Analytics software helps organizations predict future outcomes and uncover potentially profitable action paths by extracting and analyzing aggregated data about their sales, customers, financials, and overall business performance. Predictive Analytics utilizes integrated data mining, machine learning, AI, and data visualization capabilities to create predictive models that can forecast future trends and outcomes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Push Notifications software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Push Notifications tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Push Notifications software helps companies deliver personalized messages to their website visitors in real time via pop-up notifications. Additionally, Push Notifications software can serve as a centralized repository for messages from various services.
